text: Actually, Extra Credits did a little bit of brainstorming on the subject. They predicted that, since music on the NES was so limited, they had to focus on memorable tunes instead of multiple layers.

text: One of my favorite NES games and probably my 2nd favorite platformer on the console after Mario Bros 3. I know a lot of people prefer the music in the Famicom's version, but having played this version as a kid I like the NES music better.
